DETAILS.DIALOG_NOTE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you wish to delete this note? This cannot be undone.
DETAILS.OUT_OF_SCOPE_USE_AUTHOR_TASK_TO_FIND_REP: Target out of scope - use the AUTHOR task to find suggested replacements
DETAILS.OUT_OF_SCOPE_USE_AUTHOR_RECONCILE_TASK_T: Target out of scope - use the AUTHOR or RECONCILE task to find suggested replacements
DETAILS.OUT_OF_SCOPE_FIND_REPLACEMENTS: Target out of scope - click to find suggested replacements
DETAILS.OUT_OF_SCOPE_NO_SUGGESTED_REPLACEMENTS: Target out of scope - no active in scope replacements suggested
DETAILS.NOTE_TEXT_ERROR: Notes text entry cannot start with a space

ERROR.ADD_MAPPING: Unable to create Map - check required fields
ERROR.FILE_EMPTY: File contains no data or only a header row
ERROR.FILE_CONTENTS_DUPLICATES_SOURCE_AND_TARG: File contains duplicate source and target code pairs
ERROR.FILE_CONTENTS_INVALID_MAP_STATUS: Unexpected status '{{val}}' encountered in import file. Expecting DRAFT | MAPPED | UNMAPPED
ERROR.FILE_CONTENTS_INVALID_RELATIONSHIP: Unexpected relationship '{{val}}' encountered in import file. Expecting TARGET_EQUIVALENT | TARGET_INEXACT |TARGET_BROADER | TARGET_NARROWER only
ERROR.LOAD_VERSIONS: Unable to load SNOMED CT versions
ERROR.NEW_MAP_DETAIL: The map on which you are trying to create a version could not be found. This could be because the project no longer exists, or you do not have permission to access it.
ERROR.NO_ACCESS_DETAIL: The map you are attempting to view could not be found. This could be because the project no longer exists, or you do not have permission to access it.
ERROR.NO_USER_LIST: Unable to get list of users
ERROR.UNABLE_TO_GET_ASSIGNED_USERS: Unable to get list of users currently assigned to tasks in project '{{name}}'
ERROR.SERVER: Server Error: Unable to connect with backend
ERROR.OPENING_FILE: The file could not be read - please make sure that the file is accessible
ERROR.NO_SCT_VERSION: No SNOMED CT Version was specified
ERROR.SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE: The service required by the application is unavailable
ERROR.SERVICE_ISSUES: There was an error while accessing the service required by the application
ERROR.BACKEND_ISSUES: There was an error accessing the backend service located at {{url}}. Please try refreshing the Target Versions list using the sync button next to the dropdown
ERROR.FHIR_SERVER_ISSUES: There was an error while accessing the FHIR service
ERROR.LOGIN_REQUIRED: There was an unauthorized attempt to access the backend service. You may need to logout and login again
ERROR.SOURCE_INDEX_NOT_FOUND: Could not find source by index
ERROR.PROJECT_MUST_HAVE_OWNER: A project must have at least one user in the 'owner' role
ERROR.USER_ASSIGNED_TO_TASK_CANNOT_BE_REMOVED: {{name}} is assigned to tasks in the project and cannot be completely removed from the project until these tasks are completed or reassigned.
ERROR.UNABLE_TO_GET_INCOMPLETE_ROW_COUNT_FOR_T: Unable to get the number of incomplete rows for task {{task}}
ERROR.NOT_AUTHORIZED_EXPLANATION: You are not authorized to access this page
ERROR.EXISTING_VERSION: A map with the same version already exists
ERROR.PROJECT_LOAD: Project access may not be authorized
ERROR.RECONCILE_NO_MAP_AND_TARGETS: This map is not yet fully reconciled.  No Map cannot be selected when targets are specified
ERROR.RECONCILE_NO_NO_MAP_OR_TARGETS: This map is not yet fully reconciled. Either No Map needs to be selected or targets should be specified
ERROR.RECONCILE_SAME_TARGET_MULTIPLE_RELATIONS: This map is not yet fully reconciled. The same target exists with multiple relationships
ERROR.RECONCILE_DUPLICATE_TARGET: This map is not yet fully reconciled.  A target is duplicated

FORM.DELETE_WARN: Are you sure you wish to delete this map version? This cannot be undone.
FORM.FHIR_METADATA: Additional FHIR metadata (for FHIR ConceptMap export)

MAP.TITLE: Title

MAP.VERSION_ERROR: A map version is required and cannot start with a space
MAP.SOURCE_SELECT: Select a code-set or import new code-set with plus button
MAP.TARGET_SCOPE_ERROR: Target scope is required, it must be a valid ECL and cannot start with a space
MAP.TARGET_SCOPE_INVALID_ERROR: Target scope is not a valid ECL
MAP.TARGET_INEXACT_SOURCE: Target is an inexact match to source
MAP.SEARCH_SOURCE_DISPLAY: Search for Target Concept Using Source Display
MAP.REFRESH_TARGET_VERSIONS: Refresh target SNOMED CT version list
MAP.VALIDATE_TARGETS_TOOLTIP: Flag all rows where the target code is outside the target scope
MAP.VALIDATE_TARGETS_ERROR: Unexpected error occurred during validation of target scope
MAP.CLEARED_AND_REBLINDED_WARN: Any rows undergoing dual mapping will be cleared and reblinded in the new version of a dual map

TASK.AUTHOR: AUTHOR
TASK.ASSIGNEE_NOT_SET: Assignee for task is not set
TASK.NOT_AVAILABLE: You are not assigned to this task
TASK.DESCRIPTION_ERROR: Task description cannot start with a space
TASK.ROWS_CUSTOM_ERROR: Custom source index range should only contain numbers, commas and dashes
TASK.ROWS_ERROR: Incorrect format of source index range
TASK.REOPEN_CONFIRM_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to re-open this task?
TASK.AUTHOR_TASK_FOR_ALL_ROWS: Author task for all source terms
TASK.REVIEW_TASK_FOR_ALL_ROWS: Review task for all source terms
TASK.RECONCILE_TASK_FOR_ALL_ROWS: Reconcile task for all source terms
TASK.AUTHOR_TASK_FOR_SELECTED_ROWS: Author task for selected source terms
TASK.REVIEW_TASK_FOR_SELECTED_ROWS: Review task for selected source terms
TASK.RECONCILE_TASK_FOR_SELECTED_ROWS: Reconcile task for selected source terms
TASK._TASK_FOR_CUSTOM_ROWS: Task for custom source term list
TASK.ONLY_PROJECT_OWNERS_ASSIGN_TO_OTHERS: Only project owners can assign to other users
TASK.REASSIGN_TOOLTIP: Source terms already allocated to an {{taskType}} task will be re-assigned to the new user
TASK.ALLOW_SAME_AUTHOR_REVIEWER_TOOLTIP: Allow the assignee to be both the author and reviewer for these rows
TASK.ALLOW_BOTH_OVERRIDES: Reassign source terms already assigned to a task AND allow source terms to be assigned the same author and reviewer
TASK.ALLOW_BOTH_OVERRIDES_TOOLTIP: If any specified source terms are already allocated to an author task, they will be re-assigned to the new task, AND any source terms where the assignee is already the author/reviewer will be assigned to the assignee anyway
TASK.CREATE_TASK_ANYWAY: Create Task with {{total}} of {{original}} source terms (omitting {{skipped}})
TASK.CREATE_TASK_OVERRIDE: Create Task with {{total}} of {{original}} source terms (omitting {{skipped}} and overriding {{overridden}})
TASK.EXISTING_TASK: source terms already assigned to an open {{taskType}} task
TASK.ROLE_CONFLICT_TASK: source terms already assigned to an open {{oppositeType}} task for the user or they were the last author for those rows.
TASK.NO_ROWS_CAN_BE_ASSIGNED_OWNER: None of the selected rows can be assigned, please change the selection or apply overrides offered above.
TASK.NO_ROWS_CAN_BE_ASSIGNED: None of the selected rows can be assigned, please change the selection and try again.
TASK.BOTH_ROW_CONFLICT_TYPES_EXIST: Note: {{count}} source terms are members of both sets above.
TASK.NO_ROWS_CAN_BE_ASSIGNED_DESPITE_OVERRIDE: Despite overriding {{overridden}} source terms in conflict none of the {{originalCount}} source terms can be assigned. Please also override the other condition, or change the selection and try again.
TASK.COMPLETE_TASK_CONFIRM_MESSAGE: Please confirm complete as this will permanently delete the task
TASK.CANCEL_TASK_CONFIRM_MESSAGE: Please confirm as this will permanently delete the task
